description.narrative: Timely, effective and coordinated support to the children and women of Afghanistan to save lives, protect rights of children and women through development -humanitarian continuum, building resilience capacity and reducing vulnerability, which contributes to Communication And Advocacy, Cross-Sectoral - Human Rights, Cross-Sectoral - Other Programme Areas, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: UNICEF Program of cooperation has the necessary resources (financial, human and systems) to deliver on its programme results efficiently and in a cost-effective method

sector.narrative: HQ and RO technical support to multiple Goal Areas

description.narrative: Other General Services other general services

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
